Class DdapAspireExtensions

Namespace
Ddap.Aspire
Assembly
Ddap.Aspire.dll

Provides extension methods for adding DDAP to .NET Aspire applications. Enables agile development with automatic API generation from database schemas.

public static class DdapAspireExtensions

object

Methods

AddDdapApi(IDistributedApplicationBuilder, string)

Adds a DDAP API service to the Aspire application with automatic database discovery. This creates a dynamic API that automatically generates REST, gRPC, and GraphQL endpoints from the connected database schema.

public static IResourceBuilder<DdapResource> AddDdapApi(this IDistributedApplicationBuilder builder, string name)

Parameters

builder IDistributedApplicationBuilder

The distributed application builder.

name string

The name of the DDAP service.

Returns

IResourceBuilder<DdapResource>

A resource builder for the DDAP service.

Examples

var builder = DistributedApplication.CreateBuilder(args);

var db = builder.AddSqlServer("sql")
               .AddDatabase("mydb");

builder.AddDdapApi("api")
       .WithReference(db)
       .WithRestApi()
       .WithGraphQL();

builder.Build().Run();

WithAutoRefresh(IResourceBuilder<DdapResource>, int)

Configures automatic schema refresh for agile development. When enabled, the DDAP service will automatically detect database schema changes.

public static IResourceBuilder<DdapResource> WithAutoRefresh(this IResourceBuilder<DdapResource> builder, int intervalSeconds = 30)

Parameters

builder IResourceBuilder<DdapResource>

The DDAP resource builder.

intervalSeconds int

Refresh interval in seconds (default: 30).

Returns

IResourceBuilder<DdapResource>

The resource builder for chaining.

WithGraphQL(IResourceBuilder<DdapResource>, string)

Configures the DDAP service to expose GraphQL endpoints.

public static IResourceBuilder<DdapResource> WithGraphQL(this IResourceBuilder<DdapResource> builder, string path = "/graphql")

Parameters

builder IResourceBuilder<DdapResource>

The DDAP resource builder.

path string

The path for the GraphQL endpoint (default: "/graphql").

Returns

IResourceBuilder<DdapResource>

The resource builder for chaining.

WithGrpc(IResourceBuilder<DdapResource>, int?)

Configures the DDAP service to expose gRPC endpoints.

public static IResourceBuilder<DdapResource> WithGrpc(this IResourceBuilder<DdapResource> builder, int? port = null)

Parameters

builder IResourceBuilder<DdapResource>

The DDAP resource builder.

port int?

Optional port number for gRPC (default: auto-assigned).

Returns

IResourceBuilder<DdapResource>

The resource builder for chaining.

WithRestApi(IResourceBuilder<DdapResource>, int?)

Configures the DDAP service to expose REST API endpoints. Supports JSON (Newtonsoft.Json), XML, and YAML content negotiation.

public static IResourceBuilder<DdapResource> WithRestApi(this IResourceBuilder<DdapResource> builder, int? port = null)

Parameters

builder IResourceBuilder<DdapResource>

The DDAP resource builder.

port int?

Optional port number for the REST API (default: auto-assigned).

Returns

IResourceBuilder<DdapResource>

The resource builder for chaining.
